casebody.data:
No. 10-244. The Travelers Indemnity Company, et al., Petitioners v. Chubb Indemnity Insurance Company, et al. 562 U.S. 1082, 131 S. Ct. 644, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9368.

178 L. Ed. 2d 512,

November 29, 2010.

Motion of Brady C. Williamson for leave to file a brief as *513amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.

Same case below, 600 F.3d 135.
